ids_info.name: reflectometer_profile
ids_info.description: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers

reflectometer_profile/type.documentation: Type of reflectometer (frequency_swept, radar, ...). Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers.

reflectometer_profile/channel.documentation: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers.

reflectometer_profile/channel/name.documentation: Short string identifier (unique for a given device). Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer.

reflectometer_profile/channel/descriptio.documentation: Description, e.g. “channel viewing the upper divertor”. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer.

reflectometer_profile/channel/mode.documentation: Detection mode "X" or "O". Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer.

reflectometer_profile/channel/line_of_si.documentation: Description of the line of sight of the emission antenna. The first point corresponds to the centre of the antenna mouth. The second point correspond to the interception of the line of sight with the reflection surface on the inner wall. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer.

Position of the first point. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within line_of_sight_emission container: Description of the line of sight of the emission antenna. The first point corresponds to the centre of the antenna mouth. The second point correspond to the interception of the line of sight with the reflection surface on the inner wall.

Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. The second point correspond to the interception of the line of sight with the reflection surface on the inner wall. Within first_point container: Position of the first point.

Description of the line of sight of the detection antenna, to be filled only if its position is distinct from the emission antenna. The first point corresponds to the centre of the antenna mouth. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. reflectometer_profile/channel/antenna_em.documentation: Geometry of the emission antenna. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer.

Type of geometry used to describe the surface of the detector or aperture (1:'outline', 2:'circular', 3:'rectangle'). In case of 'outline', the surface is described by an outline of point in a local coordinate system defined by a centre and three unit vectors X1, X2, X3. Note that there is some flexibility here and the data provider should choose the most convenient coordinate system for the object, respecting the definitions of (X1,X2,X3) indicated below. In case of 'circular', the surface is a circle defined by its centre, radius, and normal vector oriented towards the plasma X3.  In case of 'rectangle', the surface is a rectangle defined by its centre, widths in the X1 and X2 directions, and normal vector oriented towards the plasma X3. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_emission container: Geometry of the emission antenna.

If geometry_type=2, coordinates of the centre of the circle. If geometry_type=1 or 3, coordinates of the origin of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3) describing the plane detector/aperture. This origin is located within the detector/aperture area. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_emission container: Geometry of the emission antenna.

Major radius. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_emission container: Geometry of the emission antenna. Within centre container: If geometry_type=2, coordinates of the centre of the circle. If geometry_type=1 or 3, coordinates of the origin of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3) describing the plane detector/aperture. This origin is located within the detector/aperture area.

Toroidal angle (oriented counter-clockwise when viewing from above). Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_emission container: Geometry of the emission antenna. Within centre container: If geometry_type=2, coordinates of the centre of the circle. If geometry_type=1 or 3, coordinates of the origin of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3) describing the plane detector/aperture. This origin is located within the detector/aperture area.

Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_emission container: Geometry of the emission antenna. Within centre container: If geometry_type=2, coordinates of the centre of the circle. If geometry_type=1 or 3, coordinates of the origin of the local coordinate system (X1,X2,X3) describing the plane detector/aperture. This origin is located within the detector/aperture area.

Radius of the circle, used only if geometry_type = 2. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_emission container: Geometry of the emission antenna.

Components of the X1 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X1 vector is more horizontal than X2 (has a smaller abs(Z) component) and oriented in the positive phi direction (counter-clockwise when viewing from above). Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_emission container: Geometry of the emission antenna.

Component along X axis. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_emission container: Geometry of the emission antenna. Within x1_unit_vector container: Components of the X1 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X1 vector is more horizontal than X2 (has a smaller abs(Z) component) and oriented in the positive phi direction (counter-clockwise when viewing from above).

Component along Y axis. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_emission container: Geometry of the emission antenna. Within x1_unit_vector container: Components of the X1 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X1 vector is more horizontal than X2 (has a smaller abs(Z) component) and oriented in the positive phi direction (counter-clockwise when viewing from above).

Component along Z axis. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_emission container: Geometry of the emission antenna. Within x1_unit_vector container: Components of the X1 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X1 vector is more horizontal than X2 (has a smaller abs(Z) component) and oriented in the positive phi direction (counter-clockwise when viewing from above).

Components of the X2 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X2 axis is orthonormal so that uX2 = uX3 x uX1. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_emission container: Geometry of the emission antenna.

Component along X axis. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_emission container: Geometry of the emission antenna. Within x2_unit_vector container: Components of the X2 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X2 axis is orthonormal so that uX2 = uX3 x uX1.

Component along Y axis. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_emission container: Geometry of the emission antenna. The X2 axis is orthonormal so that uX2 = uX3 x uX1.

Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_emission container: Geometry of the emission antenna. Within x2_unit_vector container: Components of the X2 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X2 axis is orthonormal so that uX2 = uX3 x uX1.

Components of the X3 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X3 axis is normal to the detector/aperture plane and oriented towards the plasma. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_emission container: Geometry of the emission antenna.

Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_emission container: Geometry of the emission antenna. Within x3_unit_vector container: Components of the X3 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X3 axis is normal to the detector/aperture plane and oriented towards the plasma.

Component along Y axis. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_emission container: Geometry of the emission antenna. Within x3_unit_vector container: Components of the X3 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X3 axis is normal to the detector/aperture plane and oriented towards the plasma.

The X3 axis is normal to the detector/aperture plane and oriented towards the plasma.

Full width of the aperture in the X1 direction, used only if geometry_type = 3. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_emission container: Geometry of the emission antenna.

Full width of the aperture in the X2 direction, used only if geometry_type = 3. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_emission container: Geometry of the emission antenna.

Irregular outline of the detector/aperture in the (X1, X2) coordinate system. Repeat the first point since this is a closed contour. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_emission container: Geometry of the emission antenna.

Positions along x1 axis. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_emission container: Geometry of the emission antenna. Within outline container: Irregular outline of the detector/aperture in the (X1, X2) coordinate system. Repeat the first point since this is a closed contour.

Positions along x2 axis. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_emission container: Geometry of the emission antenna. Within outline container: Irregular outline of the detector/aperture in the (X1, X2) coordinate system. Repeat the first point since this is a closed contour.

Surface of the detector/aperture, derived from the above geometric data. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_emission container: Geometry of the emission antenna.

The X1 vector is more horizontal than X2 (has a smaller abs(Z) component) and oriented in the positive phi direction (counter-clockwise when viewing from above).

Component along Z axis. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_detection container: Geometry of the detection antenna, to be filled only if it is distinct from the emission antenna. Within x1_unit_vector container: Components of the X1 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X1 vector is more horizontal than X2 (has a smaller abs(Z) component) and oriented in the positive phi direction (counter-clockwise when viewing from above).

Components of the X2 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X2 axis is orthonormal so that uX2 = uX3 x uX1. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_detection container: Geometry of the detection antenna, to be filled only if it is distinct from the emission antenna.

Component along X axis. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_detection container: Geometry of the detection antenna, to be filled only if it is distinct from the emission antenna. Within x2_unit_vector container: Components of the X2 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X2 axis is orthonormal so that uX2 = uX3 x uX1.

The X2 axis is orthonormal so that uX2 = uX3 x uX1.

Components of the X3 direction unit vector in the (X,Y,Z) coordinate system, where X is the major radius axis for phi = 0, Y is the major radius axis for phi = pi/2, and Z is the height axis. The X3 axis is normal to the detector/aperture plane and oriented towards the plasma. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_detection container: Geometry of the detection antenna, to be filled only if it is distinct from the emission antenna.

Full width of the aperture in the X1 direction, used only if geometry_type = 3. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_detection container: Geometry of the detection antenna, to be filled only if it is distinct from the emission antenna.

Full width of the aperture in the X2 direction, used only if geometry_type = 3. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_detection container: Geometry of the detection antenna, to be filled only if it is distinct from the emission antenna.

Irregular outline of the detector/aperture in the (X1, X2) coordinate system. Repeat the first point since this is a closed contour. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_detection container: Geometry of the detection antenna, to be filled only if it is distinct from the emission antenna.

Positions along x1 axis. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_detection container: Geometry of the detection antenna, to be filled only if it is distinct from the emission antenna. Within outline container: Irregular outline of the detector/aperture in the (X1, X2) coordinate system. Repeat the first point since this is a closed contour.

Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within antenna_detection container: Geometry of the detection antenna, to be filled only if it is distinct from the emission antenna. Within outline container: Irregular outline of the detector/aperture in the (X1, X2) coordinate system. Repeat the first point since this is a closed contour.

Surface of the detector/aperture, derived from the above geometric data. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within antenna_detection container: Geometry of the detection antenna, to be filled only if it is distinct from the emission antenna.

reflectometer_profile/channel/sweep_time.documentation: Duration of a sweep. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer.

reflectometer_profile/channel/frequencie.documentation: Array of frequencies scanned during a sweep. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer.

reflectometer_profile/channel/phase.documentation: Measured phase of the probing wave for each frequency and time slice (corresponding to the begin time of a sweep), relative to the phase at launch. Within reflectometer_profile IDS: Profile reflectometer diagnostic. Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer.

Multiple reflectometers are considered as independent diagnostics to be handled with different occurrence numbers. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas or frequency bandwidths of the reflectometer. Within phase container: Measured phase of the probing wave for each frequency and time slice (corresponding to the begin time of a sweep), relative to the phase at launch.
